title: RBI OKs interoperable payment system for internet banking transactions
description: The Reserve Bank of India has approved NPCI Bharat BillPay Ltd to implement an interoperable payment system for internet banking transactions. The new system will facilitate quicker settlement of funds for merchants. It is expected to be launched during the current calendar year. India accounts for 46% of the world's digital transactions.
